name: Galaxy pool
description:
A one player pool game with three different game modes:

Standard: Pocket the red balls while avoiding pocketting the yellow ones.

Dangerzone : Pocket the red balls and avoid having balls going out of the pool.

Gravity rush : Pocket the red balls before your score drops to zero

Made by NaejDoree for a technical test.

You can find the sources here : https://gitlab.com/Naej/galaxy-pool

Music :
